sentences.en: (= how much ) did she influence his decision?
sentences.cn: 她在多大程度上影响了他的决定？

sentences.en: All mothers share to some extent in the tension of a wedding.
sentences.cn: 从某种程度上说，所有的母亲在婚礼上多少都有点紧张。

sentences.en: Considering the extent of his injuries, he’s lucky to be alive.
sentences.cn: 就他的伤势来说，他能活下来真是够幸运的。

sentences.en: He explored the wound with his finger, trying to establish its extent.
sentences.cn: 他用手指摸了摸伤口，想要确定受伤的程度。

sentences.en: He is in debt to the extent of 10,000 dollars.
sentences.cn: 他负债已达一万美元.

sentences.en: However, the evidence is thin and, to some extent, ambiguous.
sentences.cn: 然而，这个证据难以令人信服，而且有点模棱两可。

sentences.en: I stretched that piece of elastic to its fullest extent.
sentences.cn: 我将这条橡皮筋拉长到最大限度.

sentences.en: I was amazed at the extent of his knowledge.
sentences.cn: 他知识之渊博令我惊奇。

sentences.en: It is difficult to assess the full extent of the damage.
sentences.cn: 损失情况难以全面估计。

sentences.en: It was and, to a large extent, still is a good show.
sentences.cn: 它过去是个好节目，现在在很大程度上仍是个好节目。

sentences.en: It’s too early to assess the full extent of the damage.
sentences.cn: 要全面评估损失程度还为时过早。

sentences.en: She was aghast at the extent of the damage to her car.
sentences.cn: 她的汽车的损坏程度使她震惊.

sentences.en: The extent of human cooperation is unique, but not cooperation itself.
sentences.cn: 人类的合作程度，而非合作本身，是独一无二的。

sentences.en: The extent of the violence came as a shock.
sentences.cn: 暴力程度令人震惊。

sentences.en: The new race track is nearly six miles in extent.
sentences.cn: 这条新跑道将近六英里长.

sentences.en: They examined the extent to which (= how much ) age affected language-learning ability.
sentences.cn: 他们调查了年龄会在多大程度上影响语言学习能力。

sentences.en: Things are not yet carried to that extent.
sentences.cn: 事情还没有发展到那种程度。

sentences.en: This jog warmed me to a certain extent.
sentences.cn: 跑步使我暖和一些了.

sentences.en: To a certain extent it's easier for men to get work.
sentences.cn: 在一定程度上，男性更容易找到工作。

sentences.en: To a certain extent, we are all responsible for this tragic situation.
sentences.cn: 我们都在一定程度上对这悲惨的局面负有责任。

sentences.en: To an extent, that is the reason for the meeting.
sentences.cn: 在某种程度上，那就是召开这次会议的原因。

sentences.en: To some extent this was the truth.
sentences.cn: 在某种程度上，这是事实。

sentences.en: To some extent what she argues is true.
sentences.cn: 她的论证在某种程度上是符合事实的。

sentences.en: To that extent they helped bring about their own destruction.
sentences.cn: 他们正是如此推波助澜，导致了自己的毁灭。

sentences.en: To what extent is this true of all schools?
sentences.cn: 这在多大程度上符合所有学校的实际情况？

sentences.en: When the smoke blew away, we could see the extent of the damage.
sentences.cn: 浓烟消散后， 我们就能看清破坏的程度了。

sentences.en: You can't see the full extent of the beach from here.
sentences.cn: 从这儿看不到海滩全貌。

phrases.tran_cn: 有几分，在某种程度上；在一定程度上
在一定程度上；到达…程度
达到……的程度以致；就……来说；在这个意义上；在这样的范围内；在……方面来说
最大限度地，到极点；极力地
到……的程度； 在……程度上

trans.tran_en: used to say how true something is or how great an effect or change is
